name: Mr. F and the Wand of Multus!
name_original: Mr. F and the Wand of Multus!
description:
Help Mr. save his wife and the Wand of Multus from evil  Æ Mr. !

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Space - Jump

E - Interact, advance dialogue

This game was created in under 72 hours for ZenoJam4:https://itch.io/jam/zenojam-the-perfect-jam-for-beginners-4 

The theme was "I am everywhere"

I worked on the project solo. I created all of the pixel art aside from the background with Aseprite. I did pretty much all of the programming (with help from some tutorials), starting from my 2d platformer kit: https://github.com/Kyjor/2DPlatformerKit

I used Bfxr for sound effects.

Source code for the game is here:  https://github.com/Kyjor/multus-game

Music by Juhani Junkala

https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure

Background art by ansimuz

https://ansimuz.itch.io/magic-cliffs-environment
